mapper.select: SELECT po.id AS overdueId, po.pay_overdue_code AS payOverdueCode, c.name AS customerName, c.in_charge AS inCharge, c.call_num AS callNum, con.contract_code AS contractCode, con.monthly_payment AS monthlyPayment, po.due_date AS dueDate, po.overdue_period AS overduePeriod, po.status AS status FROM pay_overdue po JOIN customer c ON c.id = po.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = po.contract_id ORDER BY po.pay_overdue_code DESC

SELECT po.id AS overdueId, po.pay_overdue_code AS payOverdueCode, c.name AS customerName, c.in_charge AS inCharge, c.call_num AS callNum, con.contract_code AS contractCode, con.monthly_payment AS monthlyPayment, po.due_date AS dueDate, po.overdue_period AS overduePeriod, po.status AS status FROM pay_overdue po JOIN customer c ON c.id = po.cum_id JOIN contract con ON con.id = po.contract_id WHERE po.id = #{id}
